title: A question regarding font pairing from a newbie
content:
Hi All,  
I am really struggling.....I am designing wedding stationery for a lady who loves Geosans light and desperately wants her heading text, extra large in it. However, I am really struggling with a body text pairing. Her design is very stark and modern. Any ideas? Thanks so much
author: karenthring

comments.content: Why not continue using the same font for the body text? Use larger than usual point size but reduce line space to make the text one well- defined block - it could even slightly overlap a very large heading. With generous white margins all round. Starkly modern!
Thankyou! That is a great idea!
You are welcome - hope it works out in practice
